word_mean_info__list.difference: 指呈现于整个表面的简单的几何图形或小型图案。
一般指简单的重复图案，或整个装饰的格调或事物的布局，也指由一些相连图形拼成的较大图案。
专指线条、轮廓、图案。强调设计的完美或有秩序。
指轮廓、外形，尤指体态，相貌或身体。
最普通用词，含义广，既可指客观物体的外形，又可用于抽象概念的“形”。
通常指由线和面所围成的外观上的形，侧重立体形状。

想想吧, 去猜吧, 算一算
母性的化身；慈母般的人

bilingual.target: 这个图形包含一个钝角。

bilingual.source: This figure has the base of a trapezoid.
bilingual.target: 这个图形有一个梯形的底边。

bilingual.source: Can you find the axis of symmetry of this figure?
bilingual.target: 你能找到这个图形的对称轴吗？

bilingual.source: Closes the current figure and starts a new figure.
bilingual.target: 闭合当前图形并开始新的图形。

bilingual.source: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.
bilingual.target: 不闭合当前图形即开始一个新图形。

bilingual.source: A hexagon is a six - sided figure.
bilingual.target: 六边形是有6个边的图形.

bilingual.source: A line that bisects a plane figure.
bilingual.target: 从中间切开一个平面图形的线。

bilingual.source: The cube is a solid geometric figure.
bilingual.target: 立方体是一个牢固的几何图形.

bilingual.source: A triangle is a plane figure with three sides .
bilingual.target: 三角形是有三个边的平面图形。

bilingual.source: To a condition or state of a figure.
bilingual.target: 虚元素属于一个图形的某一种情形或状态。

list.abstract: figure，英语单词，n. [C].1.外形;体形;人影;2.体态;风姿;3.人物;名人;
Figure是一家区块链公司，总部位于美国旧金山。

yingyinNormal.en: Calm down. We'll figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冷静点，能解决的。

yingyinNormal.en: Call me when you figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等你想明白了再给我打电话。

yingyinNormal.en: Figure that out yourself, genius?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这还用你说吗，天才？

yingyinNormal.en: We should figure out where he goes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们应该查查他到底上哪了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Knockers will help us figure it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大波霸会帮我们查个清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: The tech stuff might take a bit to figure out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 技术上的问题我可能需要一些时间来学习。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm just trying to figure out why. Any luck?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我正在思考为什么。有想到吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't say that either. We can figure this out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可我没那么说。我们可以一起解决。

yingyinNormal.en: Just give me until tomorrow. I'll figure something out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天前我一定会想出办法。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the polygrapher's job to figure out what they mean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 测谎人的任务就是分析其中的意义。

yingyinNormal.en: One vintage Mr. Mxyzptlk action figure. That's Leonard's. Children's toy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个捣蛋先生古董模型玩具，莱纳德的。儿童玩具。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just another disappointment, another letdown, another father, figure gone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们又一次失望，又一次沮丧，又一个父亲不出所料地离开。

yingyinNormal.en: Which I figure I could stretch to 400 if I ration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得节约一下，可以撑到400太阳日。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You need to figure out what you want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗？ 你应该清楚你到底需要什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, hang on! We're smart, we can figure this out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等一下，等一下！聪明如我们，一定能找出解决办法。

yingyinNormal.en: You should figure out how to take full advantage of me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该想想该怎么好好利用我。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Let's figure out a fair way to decide who's staying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，那我们想一个较公平的方法来决定谁要留下来。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. I was just trying to figure out what happened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要知道到底怎么回事？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, man. This is like figure skating team all over again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦, 天哪. 以前在选花样滑冰队员（女子运动项目）的时候就是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: I figure life is a gift and I don't intend on wasting it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生命是上帝给的，我不打算浪费它。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 数字；体形；身材；图案；图形；音型；过门；格；计算；轮廓

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公众人物；公众人物形象；公共人物

sense_info_list.en: a number, especially one which forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company

examination_example.sentence: But policymakers who refocus efforts on improving well-being rather than simply worrying about GDP <highlight>figures</highlight> could avoid the forecasted doom and may even see progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但政策制定者们应重新集中精力于提升幸福感，而非仅仅忧心GDP数字，如此才有可能避免预期的灾难，甚至可以迎来进步。

examination_example.sentence: By most recent measures, the UK's GDP has been the envy of the Western world, with record low unemployment and high growth <highlight>figures</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的评估，英国的GDP一直是西方世界羡慕的对象，失业率有史以来最低，而增长值最高。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>figure</highlight> is now 830,000 (4.4 percent) above its year ago level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在这个数字比一年前的水平高出83万（4.4个百分点）。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the most celebrated national <highlight>figures</highlight> have participated in historical events that have taken place within the EEOB's granite walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多最有名望的国家元首们参加了艾森豪威尔行政办公大楼花岗岩墙壁内发生的历史性事件。

examination_example.sentence: Among the commission's 51 members are top-tier-university presidents, scholars, lawyers, judges, and business executives, as well as prominent <highlight>figures</highlight> from diplomacy, filmmaking, music and journalism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 委员会的51名成员由顶尖大学的校长、学者、律师、法官和企业高管，以及来自外交、电影制作、音乐和新闻界的杰出人物组成。

examination_example.sentence: These epochal <highlight>figures</highlight> represented lives hard to imitate, but to be acknowledged as possessing higher authority than mere mortals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些划时代的人物代表着难以模仿的生活，但却被认为比凡人拥有更高的权威。

sense_info_list.en: to think about sb/sth until you understand them/it

examination_example.sentence: California is leading the way, as it does on so many climate efforts, in <highlight>figuring</highlight> out the details.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州在解决细节问题方面一直走在前列，就像在众多气候努力中所做的那样。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a gap year to <highlight>figure</highlight> things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花一个空档年把事情弄清楚，可以帮助预防压力，以后还能省钱。

examination_example.sentence: In a workplace that's fundamentally indifferent to your life and its meaning, office speak can help you <highlight>figure</highlight> out how you relate to your work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个与你的生活及其意义根本无关的工作场所，办公室语言可以帮助你弄清楚你是如何与工作联系在一起的。

examination_example.sentence: In one study, participants completed a battery of eight tasks, including four that tapped reflective thinking (discerning rules, comprehending vocabulary) and four that tapped intuition and creativity (generating new products or <highlight>figures</highlight> of speech).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项研究中，参与者完成了一组八项任务，其中四项利用了反思性思维(辨别规则、理解词汇)，四项利用了直觉和创造力(创造新产品或比喻)。

sense_info_list.en: a person or an animal in a drawing, painting. etc., or in a story

examination_example.sentence: It's especially vulnerable to light damage, and by the mid-1990s, Gilardi's pumpkins, roses, and other <highlight>figures</highlight> were splitting and crumbling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它特别容易受到光的损害，到了20世纪90年代中期，吉拉蒂的南瓜、玫瑰和其他图案都开始开裂和破碎。

sense_info_list.en: arithmetical calculations
a person of a particular kind, especially one who is important or distinctive in some way; to be part of a process, situation, etc. especially an important one
a picture or drawing, often with a number, in a book or other document
think, consider, or expect to be the case

exam_freq_info.chinese: 插图; 图表; 图示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a number, especially one which forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company

examination_example.sentence: One investor commenting on the Burberry <highlight>figures</highlight> was outraged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位投资者在评论博柏利的数据时被激怒了。

examination_example.sentence: While these are honorable schemes, it makes it harder for Burberry to defend these latest <highlight>figures</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这些都是可敬的计划，但这使得博柏利更难捍卫这些最新的数据。

examination_example.sentence: Higgins had forecast oil at a thousand feet, a totally made-up <highlight>figure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Higgins曾预测石油的高度为1000英尺，这完全是捏造的数字。

sense_info_list.en: a person of a particular kind, especially one who is important or distinctive in some way

examination_example.sentence: A hundred years before iconic <highlight>figures</highlight> like Bill Gates permeated our lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一百年前，在像比尔-盖茨这样的标志性人物渗透到我们生活之前。

examination_example.sentence: Guglielmo Marconi was arguably the first truly global <highlight>figure</highlight> in modern communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古列尔莫·马可尼可以说是现代通信领域第一个真正的全球人物。

examination_example.sentence: There were other important <highlight>figures</highlight>, but Marconi towered over them all in reach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有其他重要人物，但马可尼远远超过了他们。

sense_info_list.en: arithmetical calculations
a person seen indistinctly, especially at a distance

examination_example.sentence: In his book, Stick <highlight>Figures</highlight>: Drawing as a Human Practice, Professor D. B. Dowd argues that we have misfiled the significance of drawing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: D. B. Dowd教授在他的《简笔画:作为人类实践的绘画》一书中指出，我们误解了绘画的重要性。

sense_info_list.en: think, consider, or expect to be the case
a person's bodily shape, especially that of a woman and when considered to be attractive
a picture or drawing, often with a number, in a book or other document
sense_info_list.zh: 插图; 图表; 图示

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 专指线条、轮廓、图案。强调设计的完美或有秩序。
指呈现于整个表面的简单的几何图形或小型图案。
指轮廓、外形, 尤指体态, 相貌或身体。
最普通用词, 含义广, 既可指客观物体的外形, 又可用于抽象概念的"形"。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 插图; 图表; 图示

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: arithmetical calculations

examination_example.sentence: They found it difficult to <highlight>figure</highlight> out where they were.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现很难计算出他们在哪里。

examination_example.sentence: They move around clumsily, and do their best to <highlight>figure</highlight> out which way is up, but without success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们笨拙地四处走动，并尽最大努力计算出向上的方向，但却没有成功。

examination_example.sentence: This danger can be avoided, if we <highlight>figure</highlight> out how to turn human values into a programmable code.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种危险是可以避免的，只要我们能计算如何把人类的价值转化成可编程的代码。

sense_info_list.en: a number; especially one which forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company

examination_example.sentence: By contrast, just 4.4 percent of poor kids in Charlotte moved up to the top; in Detroit the <highlight>figure</highlight> was 5.5 percent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，夏洛特只有4.4%的贫困孩子能跻身前茅；在底特律，这个数字是5.5%。

examination_example.sentence: The Department of Public Health in Boston gathers and carefully examines the <highlight>figures</highlight> and then draws its conclusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 波士顿公共卫生部收集了这些数据并仔细核验，然后得出结论。

sense_info_list.en: a person of a particular kind; especially one who is important or distinctive in some way

examination_example.sentence: No Asian Americans were included in the list of historical <highlight>figures</highlight> recommended for study in K-12 classrooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有亚裔美国人被列入推荐在K-12教室学习的历史人物名单。

sense_info_list.en: a picture or drawing; often with a number; in a book or other document
sense_info_list.zh: 插图; 图表; 图示

sense_info_list.en: think; consider; or expect to be the case

examination_example.sentence: I would <highlight>figure</highlight> it's much higher now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为现在要高得多。

examination_example.sentence: I'm trying to keep a slim <highlight>figure</highlight>, you know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道的，我在努力保持苗条的身材。

sense_info_list.en: a person seen indistinctly; especially at a distance

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person seen indistinctly, especially at a distance

examination_example.sentence: A British woman who won a million prize will use the cash to bring inspirational <highlight>figures</highlight> into UK schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名英国妇女赢得了100万英镑的奖金，她将用这笔钱将励志人物带进英国学校。

examination_example.sentence: Your house may have an effect on your <highlight>figure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的房子可能会影响你的身材。

sense_info_list.en: think, consider, or expect to be the case

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>figured</highlight> whoever lost the dog was probably just as close to it as I am to my dogs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想不管丢了狗的人是谁，他可能像我和我的狗一样亲近。

sense_info_list.en: a number, especially one which forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company

examination_example.sentence: Over 40% of students are forced to work during term time and the <highlight>figure</highlight> increases to 90% during vacation periods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过40%的学生在学期期间被迫工作，而在假期期间，这个数字会增加到90%。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person seen indistinctly, especially at a distance

examination_example.sentence: As the bowl slowly sinks (下沉)，it pulls a rope that moves a human <highlight>figure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着碗慢慢下沉，它拉动了一根可以移动一个人形的绳子。

examination_example.sentence: After 15 minutes of climbing over large rocks，pushing past bushes，and slipping (滑) down loose earth，Grant found a pink <highlight>figure</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爬过大岩石15分钟后，推开灌木丛，然后滑倒在松软的土地上，格兰特发现了一个粉红色的身影。

examination_example.sentence: Look closely at the two <highlight>figures</highlight> on your left.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仔细看看你左边的两个人影。

sense_info_list.en: a number, especially one which forms part of official statistics or relates to the financial performance of a company

examination_example.sentence: It would astonish you to know the <highlight>figure</highlight> we sell them at nowadays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在出售的数字会让你感到惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following leads to the <highlight>figure</highlight> “30，000” ?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下哪项导致数字“30000”？

examination_example.sentence: What might the underlined phrase “<highlight>figure</highlight> out” means?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下划线的短语“弄懂”是什么意思？

examination_example.sentence: When I finally <highlight>figured</highlight> it out，I asked，“Why does mom get a special holiday”?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我终于弄明白的时候，我问：“妈妈为什么要过一个特别的假期”？

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>figure</highlight> this out，scientists added color patterns to pictures of faces that showed no facial expressions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了弄清楚这一点，科学家们在没有面部表情的面部照片中添加了颜色图案。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>figures</highlight> were made from used bottle caps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些画像是用用过的瓶盖制成的。

examination_example.sentence: Those two bottle-cap <highlight>figures</highlight> were exhibited (展示) in a museum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那两个瓶盖画像在博物馆展出。

sense_info_list.en: think, consider, or expect to be the case

examination_example.sentence: Finally，I <highlight>figured</highlight> engineers were cool because my idol is an excellent engineer．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我觉得工程师很酷，因为我的偶像是一位优秀的工程师。
